en: We have to abolish all nuclear weapons, because they are deadly to mankind.

en: We got all the materials together.

en: We talked to each other for a while.

en: We were landed on a lonely island.

en: We've gotten into this fixed pattern.

en: We've come to the conclusion that this is a true story.

en: We should face up to this issue.

en: We made the best of that bad situation.

en: We expect you to carry out what you have once promised.

en: We were running to and fro.
